topic.title: Anthrax Possible Expossure Location And Type Act - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1447)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1448)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="413350009" Finding with explicit context (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1451)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1450)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1447)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1448)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="413350009" Finding with explicit context (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1451)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1450)

p.ph: Anthrax Possible Expossure Location And Type Act
